name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ishuta, NDCaesar, atticusonline)

name: theoneyouwant
text: meritorious - having merit

name: catachresis
text: Well, yes. It was just awesome usage.

name: theoneyouwant
text: sorry, i was just feeling dictionaric

name: hollis
text: Or maybe... dictionarious!

name: charchar
text: definitive?

name: rowboat
text: Didactic.

name: charchar
text: Well done, sir.  Yay, words!

name: zaratustra
text: You mean it was meritorious usage.

name: anomalous3
text: skyclad....heh heh.

name: agika
text: Great, now I'm going to spend the rest of the day wondering whether snails have assholes or not.

name: omegatron
text: [IMGS OFF][IMGS OFF]

name: dumbledore
text: So they just poop into themselves?

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Looks like they basically shit down their own neck.

name: griffypoo
text: Well, at least they don't have to rip off their own head to do it.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Evolution is wonderful.

name: never_die
text: Pat sucks SO bad.

name: quietwyatt
text:
Proof positive of the theorem which states that almost every comic strip is enhanced by the caption:

"Christ, what an asshole."

name: theoneyouwant
text: DO snails have assholes?

name: hollis
text:
Yep! They are up near the front though!

http://www.carnegiemnh.org/mollusks/palandsnails/graphics/anatomy.gif

I'm glad people's assholes are located safely far away from their mouths.

name: erinye
text:
(not that you can tell with a lot of people)

(like Pat, for instance)

name: cpnglxynchos
text: huh! weird!

name: dr_butt
text: They all have tiny little assholes! It's horrible! Horrible!

name: solobuttons
text:
Ah fuck, I was gonna make a similar reference. Awww hell:

ASSHOLES COVER THE EARTH. IN A WAY TREES HAVE ASSHOLES BUT YOU CAN'T FIND THEM, THEY JUST DROP THEIR LEAVES.

name: connellingus
text: I like this strip just for Pat's answering machine message. I am deeply considering using a similar message with my name in place of Pat's name.

name: deancain29
text: I am changing my answerphone message to this.

name: rogergs
text: The tractor feed holes, and the comma after Pat, absolutely nail the library message.

name: meganasty
text: It takes some serious chops to justify-align a voicemail.

name: random_shorts
text: The library's automated message all spoken as if printed on a dot matrix printer.

name: songbirdspectre
text: does no one else find "Hello!" to be an awesome name for a brochure?

name: lechatbotte
text: Especially a brochure about skyclad jains! Hello!

name: serf
text: ive always wondered if snails had assholes

name: ttagxamm
text: I wonder if that book on the marginalized and nearly extinct culture of the Zoroastrians featured a jacket blurb from Freddie Mercury, The Only Zoroastrian in The Rock & Roll Hall of Fame?

name: erinye
text:
Jainism != Zoroastrianism

Unless you were referring to "Yoga for Vegans".

name: ttagxamm
text: You had me worried for a minute till I remembered it's the alt-text which mentions Zoroastrianism -- Freddie Mercury was born to an Indian Parsi family who I belive followed that faith.

name: erinye
text: ohokay I should've checked the alt text. I stand corrected.

name: shutup_shutup
text: I don't really agree with the usage "!=" for "does not equal."  To me it looks more like "REALLY! equals".

name: boredom_man
text: the English didn't agree with putting prepositions at the end of sentences, and that's why we let them all die in WWII!

name: honesttom
text: How does vegan yoga differ from the regular kind?

name: ocarinak
text: There's no animal products involved.

name: vincentkv
text: I don't understand how there was even a question.

name: rowboat
text: Blood Rite. Sodomy.

name: charchar
text: You stand up slowly so all the blood doesn't rush from your vegan head and make you dizzy (I'm a vegetarian so I'm allowed to pick on vegans).

name: saucy_jack
text:
I'm allowed to pick on vegans because I eat meat.

It's the food chain.

name: notcool
text: Get used to it.

name: mikeronomicon
text: I'm allowed to eat vegetarians AND vegans when all other food sources are scarce because I as well eat meat, and those who don't taste like chicken.

name: rhadamanthus
text: Pat is just the kind of asshole who could only tolerate reading "comedy" koans.

name: riazm
text:
How'd they resist naming them "Komedy Koans"

Greater men than me, that's for sure.

name: hrm
text: Jains used to sweep the ground%u2014the path whereupon their foot might tread%u2014before they walked there as not to kill any tiny organisms.

name: hrm
text: those awful clusters of symbols are dashes

name: xerol
text: So Pat is his last name?

name: howl
text: No, the comma just shows the pause between his first and last name in the manner of a computerized voice

name: ih8jonmayr
text: Pat is the guy who sucks.

name: unakau
text: I miss the days when Roast Beef was one of the dirtiest dudes in town.

name: unakau
text: Oh, and I posted this in the wrong strip.  Cool.
